00039 #ifndef IRQ_ACTIVITY_HPP
00040 #define IRQ_ACTIVITY_HPP
00041 
00042 #include "../Activity.hpp"
00043 #include "../rtt-config.h"
00044 
00045 #ifdef OROPKG_OS_XENOMAI
00046 #include <native/intr.h>
00047 #else
00048 // Provide a dump RT_INTR type. start() always returns false on non-Xenomai
00049 // OSes.
00050 struct RT_INTR { };
00051 #ifndef RTT_DLL_EXPORT
00052 #ifdef _MSC_VER
00053     #pragma message( "IRQActivity is available only on Xenomai. It will fail on startup")
00054 #else
00055 #warning "IRQActivity is available only on Xenomai. It will fail on startup"
00056 #endif
00057 #endif
00058 #endif
00059 
00060 namespace RTT { namespace extras {
00061 
00073     class RTT_API IRQActivity : public Activity
00074     {
00075         int      m_irq;
00076         RT_INTR  m_handle;
00077         base::RunnableInterface* m_runner;
00078 
00079     public:
00086         struct Provider {
00087             virtual int getIRQ() const = 0;
00088         };
00089 
00098         IRQActivity(int priority, base::RunnableInterface* _r = 0, const std::string& name ="IRQActivity" );
00099 
00109         IRQActivity(int scheduler, int priority, base::RunnableInterface* _r = 0, const std::string& name ="IRQActivity" );
00110 
00111         virtual ~IRQActivity();
00112 
00113         int  getIRQ() const;
00114         void setIRQ(int irq);
00115 
00116         virtual bool start();
00117 #ifdef OROPKG_OS_XENOMAI
00118         virtual void loop();
00119         virtual bool breakLoop();
00120         virtual void step();
00121 #endif
00122     };
